document_data.name: Asraf yn Malik el Kahaman yi Manshaka
document_data.mainbody: '''Asraf yn Malik el Kahaman yi Manshaka''' was one of the most prominent members of the [[Moonstars]] in the [[1370 DR|Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR]].
document_data.Personality: For unknown reason he remain loyal to [[Khelben Arunsun]] even after his transformation.
document_data.History:
Asraf was initially a [[Arena of Blood|blood warrior]] of [[Manshaka]]; after he entered in the [[Harper]]s as deep cover agent. 
He sided with Khelben in during the archmage's trial and entered in the Moonstar.
At one point Asraf was assaulted and bitten by a [[vampire]] but even after his transformation in a night predator he remained loyal to Khelben and continued to be his agent in the [[Vilhon Reach]] region.
